devdoc.details: A DeFi platform that allows users to deposit WBTC as collateral and take loans in stablecoins Integrates Chainlink Price Feeds for accurate collateral valuation Uses Chainlink Automation for liquidation checks

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

SafeERC20FailedOperation(address).details: An operation with an ERC-20 token failed.

addLiquidity(uint256).details: Add liquidity to the platform's stablecoin balance

calculateInterest(uint256).details: Calculate interest accrued on a loan

calculateUsdValue(uint256).details: Calculate the USD value of WBTC

checkUpkeep(bytes).details: Implementation for Chainlink Automation Checks if any loans need liquidation

params._btcUsdPriceFeed: Address of the Chainlink BTC/USD price feed
params._stablecoinAddress: Address of the stablecoin used for loans

createLoan(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: Create a new loan backed by WBTC collateral

params.collateralAmount: Amount of WBTC to use as collateral (in wei)
params.durationDays: Duration of the loan in days

params.amount: Amount of WBTC to deposit (in wei)

getBtcUsdPrice().details: Get the latest BTC/USD price from Chainlink

params.loanId: ID of the loan to liquidate

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

performUpkeep(bytes).details: Implementation for Chainlink Automation Liquidates loans that need liquidation

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

repayLoan(uint256,uint256).details: Repay a loan and retrieve collateral

params.loanId: ID of the loan to repay

shouldLiquidate(uint256).details: Check if a loan needs liquidation based on current BTC/USD price

params.loanId: ID of the loan to check

returns._0: true if loan should be liquidated

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdraw(uint256).details: Withdraw WBTC collateral if not being used for active loans

params.amount: Amount of WBTC to withdraw (in wei)

devdoc.title: BitPesa WBTC Lending Platform
